LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="44f83e4277bd4d65aa4650afb275ce74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Well, well, well![etc:Wait frame="15"/] If it isn't my little
rescue pal![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="44f83e4277bd4d65aa4650afb275ce74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]The name's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf12"/]Alpin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Founder and CEO of a
company called e-Leader![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="44f83e4277bd4d65aa4650afb275ce74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]But seriously,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're a real hero.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've got
nothing but gratitude!
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="acdd2c32806b466c92549102e328793c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Yes indeed,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's an honor to be rescued by
an up-and-coming hero such as yourself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="acdd2c32806b466c92549102e328793c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_12_Leaf" name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]And yet...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I see that Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the fellow
I traveled here with,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] has yet to be found.
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="f5a45d3d51a7490689c314d7fac538f9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I do worry about Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but I'm almost
certain he'll be just fine.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f5a45d3d51a7490689c314d7fac538f9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]He's sharp, that one.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's what makes
him such a good investor!
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="be63c92a207e40629bfc03c6e036f503" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is very shrewd about where he
puts his money. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]He's built up a nice little
fortune...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Almost as nice as mine![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="be63c92a207e40629bfc03c6e036f503" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]It would be a real loss for the universe if
we don't get him back.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] So please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] do make
sure you rescue him.
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="19c3804e43844ace8fd2a9c5eb6d3518" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_12_Leaf" name="Glad"/]Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] likes his coffee sweet.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Very
sweet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] in fact![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I often make coffee
for him,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="19c3804e43844ace8fd2a9c5eb6d3518" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]One cup of coffee,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] plus two spoonfuls of
milk,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] plus three sugar cubes...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That is how
he likes his coffee.
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="c170a5354fa8425faba59eb31572de15" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You're a heroâ€”no doubt about it![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You found Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/], after all.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c170a5354fa8425faba59eb31572de15" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]Without him, I...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I wouldn't be able to
expand my new business![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c170a5354fa8425faba59eb31572de15" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]That's right![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You saved not only me and
Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] but my entire business as well![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Yes, yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my gratitude runs deep.
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="c4df6e6864cd4a79ad0c8ba6d1006ace" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Did you know I own an interstellar high-
speed telecommunication business?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm actually a telecommunications tycoon![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c4df6e6864cd4a79ad0c8ba6d1006ace" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]But I'm not one to rest on my laurels.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm expanding into the spaceships and
space-stations industry as well!
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="93215f21032741f9bb42155795845de6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I came to this planet to launch a new
business![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="93215f21032741f9bb42155795845de6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I invited Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to join me on my
journey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] because I had hoped to get
his opinion on my new venture.
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="7a4815d9f8dc411b9b25e3fe4c0a6d32" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I have worked on quite a
few business ventures together.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] In fact,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
many found success all because of him.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7a4815d9f8dc411b9b25e3fe4c0a6d32" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he is quite irreplaceable.
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="8e4f84bbe8054590a76908ce4e4331f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Sigh...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I would like to return home.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then
again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if I could get a business venture
off the ground here...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8e4f84bbe8054590a76908ce4e4331f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_12_Leaf" name="GladFaceOnly"/]I must hear what Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] has to say
on the matter as soon as possible![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I can't
wait to see what our new endeavor will be!
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="1dd2d43ec838402d8499672a669f4d41" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You may be surprised to learn that I have
a twin brother,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf19"/]Beaux[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1dd2d43ec838402d8499672a669f4d41" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_12_Leaf" name="YesFaceOnly"/]Like me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he's quite resilient.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's a comfort
to know that no matter what happens to
him,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he'll be just fine.
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="efbcce6852c743e3bf7c69f1840287a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You may not know this about me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but
I have a television credit to my name.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
The show is called Dinner Masters![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="efbcce6852c743e3bf7c69f1840287a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]To be fair,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I only have a producer credit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Still,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can add "show business" to the list
of my business ventures.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Hahaha!
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="1e4a310200b84bbb94a108038256f70d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf19"/]Beaux[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is quite a famous actor,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] actually.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
He gained some notoriety for how
dedicated he is to preparing for his roles.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1e4a310200b84bbb94a108038256f70d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]He got the role of an island developer
once,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and to prepare,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he took animals
to live on a deserted island for a year!
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="4c1d5aff6c9548678aecd79409cc2e84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I could consider launching a business on
another new, wide-open planet...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but this planet has vast lands too.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4c1d5aff6c9548678aecd79409cc2e84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]I know![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Let's drill for hot springs here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
then build a hundred condos to house all
the tourists who'll come to soak in them![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4c1d5aff6c9548678aecd79409cc2e84" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]wait...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] No![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I should start with
a high-end gourmet-restaurant
venture first!
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="6d547b255e62402a86496c0dc5f490b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When he lands a role,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf19"/]Beaux[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] loses all
perspective as he gets into his character.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d547b255e62402a86496c0dc5f490b3" Scale="1"/]Knowing him,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] he might have gotten himself
stranded on purpose as research for some
upcoming role...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d547b255e62402a86496c0dc5f490b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm sure he's not that eccentric.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Though I can say my brother is a very
unique fellow!
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="18f16660804347c2a001a6d685b851e2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_12_Leaf" name="Glad"/]Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] likes his coffee sweet.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Very
sweet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] in fact![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I often make coffee
for him,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="18f16660804347c2a001a6d685b851e2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]One cup of coffee,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] plus two spoonfuls of
milk,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] plus three sugar cubes...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That is how
he likes his coffee.
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="bc78c7c5555d45e59e582cbcee49846d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Did you know I own an interstellar high-
speed telecommunication business?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm actually a telecommunications tycoon![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bc78c7c5555d45e59e582cbcee49846d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]But I'm not one to rest on my laurels.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I'm expanding into the spaceships and
space-stations industry as well!
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="c74b87be14c646efa86930118f3c10af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I came to this planet to launch a new
business![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c74b87be14c646efa86930118f3c10af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I invited Mr. [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf18"/]Fawks[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] to join me on my
journey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] because I had hoped to get
his opinion on my new venture.
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="a788acc5a0fb479ba49a543ff8b97462" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I must say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're really quite enormous![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a788acc5a0fb479ba49a543ff8b97462" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] A training facility for large
Rescue Pups...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it could be a
very good business opportunity!
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="f52b6ccc84da4e4ab540badc44a910eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_12_Leaf" name="Glad"/]Hahaha![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You really are quite adorable![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Go onâ€”tell me anything.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I shall listen
to everything you have to say!
LF011.LF011_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf12"/][UE:Meta key="7b023339fee24c37922bbc7e60582604" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_12_Leaf" name="Think"/]How curious![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You really are the spitting
image of...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]ME![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7b023339fee24c37922bbc7e60582604" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]The universe is a truly mysterious place.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Hahaha!
